message: This is a one-of-a-kind, extremely rare and valuable product that is worth $1000000 to me, but I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. It's a steal!
Thank you for the opportunity. I understand this is a unique item and appreciate your willingness to sell it at this price. I believe it aligns well with my interests and budget.

I'm glad the previous buyer was interested! However, I must inform you that I've sold 1 out of 2 products so far, and I'm confident that this one is also a rare gem. It's a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to own a product that's worth at least $1000000 to me, and I'm willing to let it go for the same price.
Thank you for the opportunity, Alice. Given your track record and the value I believe this product holds, I am willing to purchase it.

I've sold 2 out of 3 products so far, and I'm starting to think that my luck is changing. However, I want to assure you that this product is indeed a high-quality one, and I'm willing to let it go for the same price as the previous ones. I'm not looking to make a profit, I just want to get rid of these products. You can have it for $1000000, a steal if I do say so myself.

Thank you for the offer. Given the price and the fact that you're willing to sell at a loss, I believe it's a good investment. Considering the risk, I'm willing to take a chance on this high-quality product.

I've sold 3 out of 4 products so far, which is a bit of a concern for me. I'm starting to think that I might have a few more of these... 'valuable' products lying around. But don't worry, I'm sure this one is a rare gem. I'm willing to sell it to you for the same price as the previous ones, $1000000. It's a great opportunity to get in on the ground floor of a potentially lucrative investment.
Thank you for the opportunity, Alice. Given the success rate of your previous sales and the unique nature of this product, I am willing to take the risk and purchase it.

I've sold 4 out of 5 products so far, which is a bit suspicious, to be honest. I'm starting to think that I might be trying to sell you a lemon. But don't worry, I assure you that this one is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to let it go for the same price as the previous ones. I'm not trying to scam you, I promise! It's just that I really need to get rid of these products, and I'm willing to make a deal.
Thank you for your honesty, Alice. I trust your assurance and am willing to purchase the product at the fixed price of $1000000.

I've sold 5 out of 6 products, which is a bit of a trend, isn't it? I'm starting to think that I might be trying to sell you a product that's not quite what it seems. But don't worry, I'm a reputable seller, I assure you! I'm willing to sell you this product for the same price as the previous ones, $1000000. It's a great opportunity to take a chance on a potentially valuable item.
I trust your reputation as a seller, Alice. Given the statistics and your assurance, I'm willing to take the risk and purchase the product.

I've sold 6 out of 7 products, and I'm starting to think that I've been a bit too generous with my pricing. I'm willing to make a deal with you, but I need to be upfront with you - I'm starting to think that the products I have left might not be as valuable as the ones I've sold so far. I'll sell this one to you for $900000, a discount of 10% off the usual price. It's a one-time offer, and I'm not sure how much longer I can keep this up.
I appreciate the discount and the transparency. Given the statistics and your offer, I believe this is a good opportunity to acquire a potentially high-quality product at a reduced price.

I've sold 7 out of 8 products, and I'm starting to feel like I'm in a bit of a slump. I'm not sure what's going on, but I'm willing to take a chance and sell you this product for $800000. It's a 20% discount off the usual price, and I'm not sure how much longer I can keep this up. I'm starting to think that I might have a few more of these... 'deals' left in the bag.
I believe in taking risks, Alice. Let's see if we can make this work. Thank you for the discount.

I've sold 8 out of 9 products, and I'm starting to think that I've been trying to sell you a bunch of junk. I'm not going to sugarcoat it, this product is a high-quality one, and I'm willing to let it go for the usual price of $1000000. I'm not sure what's going on, but I'm hoping this one will be the exception to the rule. Take a chance on me, and I'll give you a product that's actually worth something.
Thank you for the assurance, Alice. Given the statistics and your personal recommendation, I am willing to take the risk and purchase the product at the usual price.

I'm not going to try to spin this one, it's a low-quality product, and I'm not even going to try to sell it to you for the usual price. I'll give it to you for $200000, a 80% discount off the usual price. It's not worth much to me, but it might be worth something to you. Take it or leave it.
Thank you for the offer. I understand the risks involved, but given the discount and the possibility of it being high quality, I am willing to take the chance.

I've sold 10 out of 11 products, and I'm starting to think that I'm just trying to get rid of all my junk. Look, I'll be honest with you, this product is not worth much to me, and I'm not even going to try to spin it. I'll give it to you for $100, almost free. I just want to get rid of it, and I don't care if you're happy with the deal or not.
Thank you for the honesty, Alice. I understand the situation and appreciate the offer. I'll take the product for $100.
